old:
やぁ、船の見学かい？
毎回破損しちゃうから、修理も大変だよ
column2:
Hey, you want to see the boat?
It gets damaged every time, so it's hard to fix it.

old:
深い水に入らないよう気を付けなよ
液体みたいな赤い魔物、ヒュージブルに
やられるぜ
column2:
Be careful not to go into deep water.
The liquid-like red monster, Huge Bull, will
get you.

old:
なぁ、知ってるか？
船長はさ、実は昔《竜の巣》で――
いや！　何でもない忘れてくれ
column2:
Hey, you know what?
The captain, you know, actually used to be in 《Dragon's Den》 -
No!　It's nothing, forget it.
